backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling access-controlled user profiles, contact submissions, appointment requests, and admin-only domain draft storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon links, and bootstrap script for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the SiteLayout container.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: Form component for submitting appointment requests with validation, submission handling, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Validated contact form that submits messages to the backend and displays success or error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component showing branding, quick links, and contact info using config values.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu, and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper composing header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines hospital name and a helper for generating page titles.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Centralized configuration for hospital contact and hours information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainDraft.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and saving domain draft data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Mutation hook to submit appointment requests and invalidate appointment queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Mutation hook to submit contact form data and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the application's color theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page rendering mission, values, and hospital information with dynamic page title.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Appointment booking page with hero text, steps overview, and an appointment request form.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page displaying phone, email, address, hours, and a contact form.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder doctors page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Authenticated page to view and edit a domain draft with save functionality and status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, emergency notice, and highlights of core services.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 error page offering navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services overview page listing multiple medical specialties with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom theme variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests related to domain draft state management.
